name: Flora from the Meta-Macroverse Vol. 1 - Machrome 2/2
description:
Turn your favorite space in the Metaverse into a giant, living, garden with this macro photography selection of beautiful plants and flowers, the color of nature is now at your fingertips, ready to decorate your virtual spot. The first volume of this collection consists of 10 + 2 photographs that were taken during a trip to the city of Guatemala.

This is also my genesis drop for Hic et Nunc, this space is now the official NFT Marketplace for my macrophotography art.

Collection List:
- 7 Still Photographs (3024x3024 px, RGB)
- 3 Animated photos (1280x1280 px, 30 sec, 30fps)
- 2 Machromes (Special edition, B&W, signed by the artist photos, given for FREE to the first 2 customers of this collection, 6118x6118 px, Grayscale)
- 1 Music NFTheme (included in the animated photos)
